Title: It Could've Been Great
Writer: Rebecca Sugar (creator), Joseph D. Johnston, Jeff Liu, Matt Burnett (story), Ben Levin (story), Rebecca Sugar (story), Ian Jones-Quartey (story), Kat Morris (story)
Actors: Dee Bradley Baker, Zach Callison, Michaela Dietz, Estelle
Plot: While working on their drill, Peridot and the Gems realize they're missing something important and must travel to a Homeworld base.
